Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientHandler
    Represents the clientHandler, so it receives and sends message from and to a client.
    Countdown
    Used at the beginning, first of the clients login.
    GameManager
    Contains a reference to all the client connections; when someone sends a message to the server side, the class notifies the controller.
    GameRoom
    Public class that handles the connections and disconnections of the clients before the game starts.
    Server
    Represents the server, so it accepts or declines new client connections.
    SocketConnection
    Public class that allows to manage the connection and the disconnection of a client before the game.
